1. Exclusive: WHO says partners can start talks to buy mpox vaccines before its approval  Reuters
  2. WHO Says Partners Can Start Talks To Buy Mpox Vaccines Before Their Approval  NDTV
  3. Partners Can Start Buying Mpox Vaccines Before UN Approval For Administration In Africa: WHO | TheHealthSi  TheHealthSite
  4. Exclusive-WHO Says Partners Can Start Talks to Buy Mpox Vaccines Before Its Approval  U.S. News & World Report
  5. WHO Allows Early Mpox Vaccine Purchases To Speed Up Africa's Access  BW Healthcare
